title: How do I enable a screen lock that must be unlocked using a PIN?
answer:
1. Touch Settings > Security < Screen lock > PIN. 

 1. Set the PIN. When you press the power key to light up the screen or power on your phone, you need to enter the PIN. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110877) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110878)
